root: ^A crude formation of bones and scattered blood decorates the ground.

c-0: ^Whatever these markings are, they are no good. Time to put an end to whatever these druids are planning.
c-1: ^These bones, the blood - these druids seem to be performing a ritual of sorts. These symbols and sacrifices appear to have some connection to Selandris. Surely, whatever these druids were up to - no good can come of this...
c-2: ^The Circles of binding, the ritual - it’s all reminiscent of the summoning rituals you learned about as a child, but on a much grander scale. To bring back the Dead Star would require a tremendous amount of energy from whatever was bound by these circles.

c-3: ^With a swift kick, you disturb the bones. For a moment, the surrounding area goes quiet before a soft, rumbling tremble starts to shake the ground.
^A loud roar sends a flock of birds flying from their nests, the sound reverberating in the back of your mind. "FREEEEEEE MEEEEE-..."
